Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I was wondering do the stats (or bars) for Courage and Stupidity play a part in anything yet? and is there a way to increase and decrease said bars?

Thanks in advance.

simply put. to my knowledge they play no part at the moment and are more or less placeholders/concept showing of whats to come. for now there is no way to change the bars (except editing the save file i imagine), but that may well come in the future.

ooo that may not be strictly true, i seem to remember hearing once that they effected the responses seen in IVA.
I believe they control your kerbonaut's facial expressions. Stupidity causes more grinning, courage causes less frequent scared faces. I believe. Other opinions?
and BA flag makes them all Jeb alikes
Stupidity should actually be 'smartness'' or ''intelligence'', because more ''stupidity'' is actually a smarter Kerbal.
